convenience: Customers can shop from the comfort of their own homes.
diverse product selection: A wide variety of products are available to cater to the needs of all customers.
competitive pricing: Competitive prices are offered to attract and retain customers.
reliable delivery service: A reliable delivery service ensures that customers receive their orders on time and in good condition.
user-friendly website and app: The website and/or app is easy to use and navigate, making it simple for customers to find what they need.
excellent customer service: Excellent customer service is provided, answering questions and resolving issues in a timely and friendly manner.
